nodes.name: Governed

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `governor` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the governor.
nodes.name: onlyGovernor

@param newGovernor The address to transfer governorship to.

devdoc.details: The Governable contract has an governor smart contract address, and provides basic authorization control functions, this simplifies the implementation of "gov permissions".

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `governor` of the contract to the sender account.

transferGovernor(address).details: Allows the current governor to transfer control of the contract to a newGovernor.

params.newGovernor: The address to transfer governorship to.

devdoc.title: Governed
